DOC.brief_summary: This study open label , long-term extension study subject moderate severe ulcerative colitis design evaluate long term therapy CP-690,550 .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Study Of CP-690,550 In Subjects With Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Subjects complete induction study A3921094 A3921095 classify meet clinical response criterion ; OR Subjects complete maintenance study A3921096 discontinue treatment early Study A3921096 due treatment failure . Subjects major protocol violation Study A3921094 , A3921095 A3921096 . Presence indeterminate colitis , microscopic colitis , ischemic colitis , infectious colitis , clinical finding suggestive Crohn 's disease . Subjects surgery ulcerative colitis opinion investigator , likely require surgery ulcerative colitis study period .
